actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To require businesses to permit customers to cancel certain subscription services in the same manner and by the same means as is provided by such person to individuals to subscribe to such service.

summary.text: Consumer Cancellation Fairness Act - Directs the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) to require subscription service providers to allow subscribers to cancel service the same way they subscribed to such service.

titles.title: To require businesses to permit customers to cancel certain subscription services in the same manner and by the same means as is provided by such person to individuals to subscribe to such service.
